meaningMnemonic: <kanji>All</kanji> <kanji>general</kanji>-<kanji>al</kanji>! It's super general. It's <vocabulary>general</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>overall</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>across the board</vocabulary>. Nothing specific going on here.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
